nodes.text: Orthodontia was the study and practice of medicine relating to teeth. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, the xenopathologist and combat medic Archiban Kimble, also known as Doc, practiced orthodontia for a brief time on the planet Rodia.

Orthodontia is first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, in the message "Healthy teeth" from the Jedi Knight class's companion character Doc. Only female players who are pursuing a romance with Doc will receive the message.
